text:
Hi everyone,

We would like to inquire about how to make the app compatible with all the available HubSpot plans?
Right now on the app listing page it shows that it is compatible with "Marketing Hub Enterprise or higher plans only".
Screenshot - <https://prnt.sc/46pCt2ulPakk>

I tried checking the options in the app listing but didn't find anything where I can change it.

App name: *Website Speedy - Load Faster*
App Id: *3672895*

Please advise.
